revised_title: Further Evidences of Deuterosaurs and Rhopalodon from Permian Rocks of Russia
tldr: The author examines the structure, organization, and classification of fossil reptiles, specifically Deuterosaurus and Rhopalodon, found in Permian rocks of Russia. The study focuses on distinguishing Labyrinthodont remains from those with a Theriodont type of dentition and analyzing skull structures, vertebrae, and limb bones of these creatures.
